dialogueLines.line: It must be. I see someone in a spooky costume.
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: Hello! Can you show us the way to the festival?
dialogueLines.speaker: pump

dialogueLines.line: I'm a little hungry right now!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: I was wondering if I could have some of your body! Even if it's just a finger!
dialogueLines.speaker: lily

dialogueLines.line: Pump, I think this lady wants to helps us.
dialogueLines.speaker: skid
